---
title: "Check Excel Download Log Profil"
format: html
editor: visual
---

```{r}
library(rstudioapi) # for file and directory selection
library(dplyr)
library(lubridate)

source("R/wave_helpers.R")
```

```{r}
path_download_log <- selectFile(
  caption = "Select download log in .xlsx format. Press cancel to skip.",
  label = "Select",
  filter = ".xlsx",
  path = getActiveProject()
  )
```

```{r read and assert download log}
download_log <- read_download_log(path_download_log)
```
